message.entry: In function deconvwnr, input image must have at least two elements.
In function deconvwnr, PSF must have at least two elements.
In function deconvwnr, PSF cannot be zero everywhere.
Invalid input in function deconvwnr: provide characteristics for noise.
In function deconvwnr, size of the PSF must not exceed the image size in any nonsingleton dimension.
DECONVWNR(A,PSF,NSR): NSR has to be a scalar or an array of size A.
